disketaa_bloom.name: Bloom
disketaa_bloom.description: Creates a post-process glow that mimics intense brightness and light scattering.

intensity.name: Intensity
intensity.desc: Controls the spread and radius of the bloom effect.

brightness.name: Brightness
brightness.desc: Controls the intensity and strength of the bloom glow.

falloff.name: Falloff
falloff.desc: Controls how smoothly the bloom transitions from threshold to full brightness.

threshold.name: Threshold
threshold.desc: Sets the minimum brightness level for pixels to generate bloom.

samples.name: Samples
samples.desc: Sets the number of samples used for blur calculation.
